column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A truck transporting rice from ------Battambang------ to Phnom Penh crashed into fish ponds on Road 5 at around 3 am.------A source suggests the driver fell asleep at the wheel and took his truck off the road. He managed to get out with no serious injury.------The owner of the truck arrived with another vehicle and rescued several tons of rice from the water.------The truck has now been craned out.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/740724.html------
